name: Voodoocide (Demo)
description:
The demo features 5 possible suicide/voodoocide methods currently available ( out of a planned 20 total ). There is also a portable suicide method in the collectible safety pins the player can create from gathering stickpins. I’m releasing this demo as an unfinished build to get feedback/view playtester bugs so I know what to fix in the final release, so it would be helpful if anyone wants to link me to any let’s plays they come up with.

Thanks, and I hope you enjoy trying out the early version of the game!

--Suits

NOTE: Controls are IN GAME. The game supports both gamepad and keyboard/mouse ( you need to pick which one at the start of the game ) Would recommend headphones, thanks to all the musicians who contributed to the music, some of it is placeholder for now.
